blah.title: Terminal Flat Theme
thanks: This theme was created using [this nice thingy](http://terminal.sexy/) and [FlatColors](http://flatuicolors.com/). So, big thanks to these guys! :cake:

content: # This is currently compatible with Gnome Terminal only
# The install script is currently compatible with Gnome Terminal only

p: To switch back to the original scheme just switch the profile in the terminal preferences, since the script above will just create a new profile.

Currently this repository contains the scheme for Gnome Terminal (default terminal in Ubuntu) and Terminal.app. However, you can use [this link](http://terminal.sexy/#FyY0-vr6V2x_7mJUUNqL_blNY7Hlx4HlU97DuLu7eY6j_HtuZfai_dhAYrz51J3rV-3P2-Dg) to export this theme for your terminal.
After running the script above, you have to select the new profile.

blockquote: In Gnome Terminal, you have to go to `Edit > Preferences -> Profile tab`
